amendment.description: Amendment directs the Export-Import Bank to give preference to U.S. firms which adopt a code of conduct for their business activities in China that is consistent with human and worker rights.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to direct the Export-Import Bank to give preference to U.S. firms which adopt a code of conduct for their business activities in China that is consistent with internationally-recognized human and worker rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Evans amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 182 (Roll no. 472).
